songs.title: You Will Never Know (Snippet)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah

[Verse]
Ayy
Brace as you feel the cold like the winter snow
I flew in December defeating my slumber
I'm drowning and you'll never know
Blasted, blasted, want the pressure-pressure
Among the lord, succumb to me under pressure, ayy
Brace
Look at the slits on my wrist
Look at the blood in my piss
Cold as my heart
Tend to get better at this
By the time when I wasn't just
Cold from the start
Grabbin' the K with intentions
You bust it, but niggas be jumpin'
And plus if you add it up, add it up, put it up in your heart
Pussy, might find your heart

[Chorus]
Ayy, ayy
Blasted, blasted, ayy
Ayy
Bitch, I'm blasted, blasted
Ayy, ayy, ayy
Blasted, blasted
Bitch, I'm blasted, blasted
Bitch, I'm blasted, blasted (Gang)

[Bridge]
Ayy, ayy, ayy
Ayy
Ayy, ayy, ayy (Gang)
Ayy, ayy
Ayy, ayy, ayy (Gang)
Ayy, ayy
Ayy, ayy, ayy (Gang)
Ayy, ayy
Ayy
Ayy
